p: The levels of the inflammatory cytokines IL6, MCP1, KC, and IL12p70 were higher in the lungs of L. paracasei-fed than PBS-fed mice. However, only the differences in the levels of IL6 and MCP1 reached significance (Fig. 3). In addition, although the levels of the anti-inflammatory cytokine IL10 were higher in the L. paracasei than PBS group, the difference was not significant (Fig. 3).
